mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (boardKategory, boardTitle, boardContents, boardDate) VALUES (#{boardKategory}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT boardNum, boardTitle, boardUserId, DATE_FORMAT(boardDate, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s'),boardHitCnt AS boardDate FROM board WHERE deleted_yn = 'N' ORDER BY boardNum DESC
SELECT idx, title, contents, user_id, hit_cnt, DATE_FORMAT(create_dt, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_dt, DATE_FORMAT(update_dt, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS update_dt FROM board WHERE idx = #{idx}
